CustomField.description: The start date that applies to this status when determining the due date. Only populated for statuses that have an SLA.
CustomField.formula: CASE( Advice_Status__c, "Setup", DATEVALUE( CreatedDate), "Data gathering", Setup_Complete_Date__c, "In fulfilment", OW_fulfilment_start_date__c, null )
CustomField.label: Status start date (formula)
